channel.title: Suggestions to my new private server
channel.description:
Before you say this doesn't belong in the help section. I think it does, I'm asking for you to help me with ideas for my new private server that I will be releasing to the public.
[b]Server[/b] Hopefully I will maintain this server well, I wil be using a very good server source that not many other people use.
I need some suggestions on :-
Server name Features Client features Stability (What to stop ect) Models Something unique (I'n not making a map nor model)
Please post your suggestions and what you would like to see on a private server, when I start the development I will post in the development section, thanks.
